summary: Israel is a country in West Asia with a rich history and diverse culture. It has had a turbulent past, with many demographic changes and conflicts. The country was established in 1948 after a civil war and the Holocost, and its creation led to the First Arab-Israeli War. Israel has had a long-standing conflict with Palestinian Arabs, which continues to this day. Despite this, Israel has a strong economy and is technologically advanced. It is known for its unicameral parliament, the Knesset, and its official language, Hebrew, which was revived.
title: Israel
